author: Victor Bergeron A.K.A Trader Vic
description: Basically a lemon honey Daiquiri or a lemon Canch√†nchara - very tasty it is too.
name: Tahitian Honey Bee
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
